questions.usual_brand: What Is your USUAL BRAND of CIGARETTES?
questions.usual_brand_check: Is your USUAL BRAND? Check one
questions.purchase_frequency: Out of the LAST TEN times you bought cigarettes, how many times did you buy your USUAL BRAND? Please enter a number between 0 and 10 in the boxes provided.
questions.second_choice_brand: If you don't have a second choice brand, write none above.
questions.purchase_method: How do you purchase cigarettes? Check one.
questions.coupon_usage: How often do you use coupons to buy brands OTHER THAN your Usual Brand? Check one.
questions.collecting_proof: Are you collecting packs proof of purchase UP for redeeming money for any cigarettes brand?
